channel.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][u]Devion's Realm[/u][/size][/center] Ah , where to start..... I started out with Java just before summer 2010. Back then i used to play SabsabiOnline , without all the customs and such. Soon later , we all got reset , we suffered from rollbacks and the mods had us confused with 'banning' eachother and i also remember Jack editing some acounts server sided so he could kill everyone to stabilize the economy and such.... Then i found out this entire community of RSPS , and i wanted to start off myself. I looked around for a base that wasn't flooded with too many customs and crappy content , then i stumbled upon Exion's PI base. It looked alot like Sabsabionline , so i gave it a shot. The first few days i suffered from minor headaches because of the codes , a week later i learned basic stuff and right now i think i should start with adding real stuff =D
Thanks to Exion for the base , Jack for sort of inspiring me and I Vain I for his great tutorials =D
so without any further chitchat , i'll move on to making a nicely editted PI :)
[b][u]What wil it look like?[/u][/b] I will try to add as much content to it as possible , most things won't be like the real RuneScape offcourse , but i will try to add the major content from 317 and 474 like Warrior's Guild and GWD. I'll also try to add quests and a storyline to it ( they will be much like the quests in the real RuneScape , as wil their rewards , like Desert Treasure and the Ancient Magicks ) You wil also have to put effort in simple things. ( like teletabs , route to DKS , etc )
[u][b]Progress[/b][/u] * Added Zamorak Godwars * Added the new HPbars and new hitsplashes * Changed teleports to the right coordinates with the right levels and the right runes * Added an improvised warriors guild using an area i won't be using anyways * Added the digging on mole hills to enter the mole tunnels in falador * Added an option to change your respawn point in between lumbridge and falador ( working on the quest ) * Added teleport tablet creation using 474 construction objects and with soft clay , runes level reqs etc... * The runecrafting skill is about 80% done , only the Abyss has to be finished. ( accessing altars with talismans and portals to get back out are all configured ) * Doors.cfg wasn't all that easy to read , so i took a look at how the doors are handled in objectHandler.java and made it ALOT more eassier to understand , i will spend some time coding all the doors that are required in quests and such =D * Configured mining clay and using buckets on water sources to get a bucket of water , using that with clay gives you soft clay so you can make teletabs now =D * Added some dialogue with NPC and players to support transportation from port sarim to void knight outpost , entrana and karamja and also from relekka to waterbirth island
[b][u]Media[/u][/b]
[center][b]DEVION'S REALM YOUTUBE CHANNEL[/b] [b]- New hitmarks and Hitsplashes ( might be removed in future ) -[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4XzcmqBenpQ
[b]- Zamorak Godwars -[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3TXA8_EgNk&feature=iv&annotation_id=annotation_373328
[b]- Teletab Creation -[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SLEX8ge6OeQ
[b]- Warrior's Guild -[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Fg-1huCxKg [/center]
[b][u]Things i might add[/u][/b] * Mole tunnels will be used as a new Slayer location * The GWD bosses will have 4 different locations , the spot where you get your KC up will also be changed * Finish off the Kalphite Queen ( its finished , just the spawning seems to fail ... ) * Fix all the dupes... * Quests , so i can implement the rewards to the game * Treasure Trails , also have to fix the armour rewards * No more 2 clicking to get to your destination , you wil have to run!( for example : to get to the DKS you wil have to go from Camelot -> Seers Village -> Rellekka -> Waterbirth -> Waterbirth dungeons -> DKS ) * I will add and if not improve the skills , currently there are limitted options , i'll be adding alot more ways to train them.

item.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

I Vain I:

It’s not the combat that makes it fail. 96% of everything programmed in PI is horrible and done the wrong way. Also the networking sucks.

it does have potential , i mainly learned Java because of it’s simplicity.
but yeah , it requires some fixes.

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]This may not fail from your lack of knowledge, but it will sure as hell fail because it’s PI.

Nonetheless, have fun doing it.[/quote]

aww , c’mon , don’t be so harsh for PI , i’m planning on fixing most glitches soon , including some poorly written combat aswell =D
runecrafting is sort of finished , now working on mining pure essence and the NPC’s that will tele you to those mines , and still have to finish up the abyss.
i do feel like i’ve hit a wall with doors <.<
just can’t get them to work properly , i think i will replace the current doors method by the one that delta is using because PI’s doors configuration is confusing…

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

X Entinity X:

Can I see your ‘Tab Creating’ please.

code or vid?
or both , the main thing is when you click on a lectern ( from construction ) it shows 5 options , provided you have a piece of soft clay and the runes and the level , it will delete them and make a tab
here’s an example of the varrock teletab creation

if (c.usingLectern == 1) {
					if (c.playerLevel[6] >= 25){
						if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1)) {
							if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1761,1)) {
								c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1);
								c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3);
								c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1);
								c.getItems().deleteItem(1761,c.getItems().getItemSlot(1761),1);
								c.getItems().addItem(8007, 1);
							} else {
								c.sendMessage("You need a piece of soft clay to create a tablet.");
							}
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("You don't have the runes required to create this tablet.");
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Your magic level isn't high enough to create this tablet.");
					}
				}

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:9, topic:381510”][quote author=Cres link=topic=477322.msg3494380#msg3494380 date=1297196273]

Why don’t you implement proper 474 maps from Thing1, instead of useing other places to estample a look-a-like of the place.

as i said before , i tried adding 474 maps , ended up with nothing but errors , i tried my best at fixing them , but to no avail =(
but i’ll give it another shot later on , has Thing1 made a 474 client for PI , or do we have to adjust the client to work for PI?
[/quote]

You can’t ‘adjust’ a different revision client to a different revision server unless you change either the packets in the client or in the server…

Not to meantion there’d be quite a few other problems with it as well…[/quote]

What Kono-chan said, you can’t just “adjust”, there’s alot more then adding a .text mapConfig file such as; Client.java Map reading.

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:5, topic:381510”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=477322.msg3492171#msg3492171 date=1297017756]

Why not just use a REAL 474 client instead of hardcoding tons of shit into a 317 one.

I’ve looked around and couldn’t find a good 474 client suitable for PI , most of them were 508+
and even those didn’t work , i also tried a 474 base , but i didn’t get far with it , hence why i stayed with PI client

No shit it won’t work with PI. PI sucks. Also, the packets are different in 474 and 508, so you would have to change all of them to covert PI to 474 or 508 even…

And if you didn’t get far with any 474 bases then I don’t really see this going anywhere.
[/quote]

Those 474 bases didn’t even have combat added , and all the packets are different , you expect every person coding RSPS to use the same packets for every different client version?
and yes , i converted the 508 client to work the 317 PI server , i even used tutorials for that ( the person who made the client had written it ) and even those failed.
and i there were no 474 bases around ( like we have Flaresoft now ) , 474 was extinct when i started out.[/quote]

I just told you all of the packets are different, lol. And yes, every person generally does use the same packets if they’re using the same client. Ie. every 317 client / server has the same packets, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm - 317 - RS2 remake
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[center][size=20pt]Devion’s Realm[/size][/center]
Ah , where to start…
I started out with Java just before summer 2010.
Back then i used to play SabsabiOnline , without all the customs and such.
Soon later , we all got reset , we suffered from rollbacks and the mods had us confused with ‘banning’ eachother and i also remember Jack editing some acounts server sided so he could kill everyone to stabilize the economy and such…
Then i found out this entire community of RSPS , and i wanted to start off myself.
I looked around for a base that wasn’t flooded with too many customs and crappy content , then i stumbled upon Exion’s PI base.
It looked alot like Sabsabionline , so i gave it a shot.
The first few days i suffered from minor headaches because of the codes , a week later i learned basic stuff and right now i think i should start with adding real stuff =D

Thanks to Exion for the base , Jack for sort of inspiring me and I Vain I for his great tutorials =D

so without any further chitchat , i’ll move on to making a nicely editted PI

What wil it look like?
I will try to add as much content to it as possible , most things won’t be like the real RuneScape offcourse , but i will try to add the major content from 317 and 474 like Warrior’s Guild and GWD.
I’ll also try to add quests and a storyline to it ( they will be much like the quests in the real RuneScape , as wil their rewards , like Desert Treasure and the Ancient Magicks )
You wil also have to put effort in simple things. ( like teletabs , route to DKS , etc )

Progress

  • Added Zamorak Godwars
  • Added the new HPbars and new hitsplashes
  • Changed teleports to the right coordinates with the right levels and the right runes
  • Added an improvised warriors guild using an area i won’t be using anyways
  • Added the digging on mole hills to enter the mole tunnels in falador
  • Added an option to change your respawn point in between lumbridge and falador ( working on the quest )
  • Added teleport tablet creation using 474 construction objects and with soft clay , runes level reqs etc…
  • The runecrafting skill is about 80% done , only the Abyss has to be finished. ( accessing altars with talismans and portals to get back out are all configured )
  • Doors.cfg wasn’t all that easy to read , so i took a look at how the doors are handled in objectHandler.java and made it ALOT more eassier to understand , i will spend some time coding all the doors that are required in quests and such =D
  • Configured mining clay and using buckets on water sources to get a bucket of water , using that with clay gives you soft clay so you can make teletabs now =D
  • Added some dialogue with NPC and players to support transportation from port sarim to void knight outpost , entrana and karamja and also from relekka to waterbirth island

Media

[center]DEVION’S REALM YOUTUBE CHANNEL
- New hitmarks and Hitsplashes ( might be removed in future ) -

- Zamorak Godwars -

- Teletab Creation -

- Warrior’s Guild -


[/center]

Things i might add

  • Mole tunnels will be used as a new Slayer location
  • The GWD bosses will have 4 different locations , the spot where you get your KC up will also be changed
  • Finish off the Kalphite Queen ( its finished , just the spawning seems to fail … )
  • Fix all the dupes…
  • Quests , so i can implement the rewards to the game
  • Treasure Trails , also have to fix the armour rewards
  • No more 2 clicking to get to your destination , you wil have to run!( for example : to get to the DKS you wil have to go from Camelot -> Seers Village -> Rellekka -> Waterbirth -> Waterbirth dungeons -> DKS )
  • I will add and if not improve the skills , currently there are limitted options , i’ll be adding alot more ways to train them.

Read full topic
